title: The efficacy and safety of remimazolam tosilate compared with propofol for endoscopic retrograde cholangiopancreatography under monitored anesthesia care: A single-center randomized controlled clinical trial
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19

Author(s): Biyun Zhou, Shiyong Li, Ailin Luo, Hongbo Zheng
